description: This course is for the new or experienced manager. The course will guide you through various leadership skills, enhancing your personal and professional goals. meetin skills and motivating employees. You will further enhance your listening and communication skills. We will discuss how to properly sell your ideas, institute change, motivate and engage your staff and employees. Materials include many segmented lectures that will guide you step by step in acheiving these goals. Any new or existing Supervisor or manager should take this course in order to acheive a more cost effective palnning structure, develope your management staff and team and keep up with the changing teams and techiniques for better communications skills. This course runs approximately 40 minutes. Management Skills, Communications Skills, Leadership Skills are the key elements for both personal and professional success.
title: Management Skills for Success and Employee Relations
